episodes.title: What was NXIVM? A debrief of the weirdest cult saga of the 21st century & Scientology's role
episodes.description:
A deep dive into the similarities and differences between Scientology and NXIVM groups as a way into the A Cappella Innovations saga. A message board thread is unearthed that has all the inner circle NXIVM members plotting to infiltrate the college a cappella scene

Links:

2003 Forbes cover story "Cult of Personality": https://www.forbes.com/sites/willyakowicz/2019/05/15/keith-raniere-the-leader-of-the-nxivm-sex-cult/
